description: Undulating palindromic primes of form ABABAB...BA with alternating prime and nonprime digits.
references: C. A. Pickover, "Wonders of Numbers", Oxford New York 2001, Chapter 52, pp. 123-124, 316-317.
links: C. A. Pickover, "Wonders of Numbers, Adventures in Mathematics, Mind and Meaning," Zentralblatt review
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._
